application_details: Teva seeks to amend pleadings post-trial to introduce new liability claims (Trade-Marks Act) and expand quantum claims
decision_reasoning: Amendments must not cause unjust prejudice or delay justice
The bifurcation order required all evidence on liability issues to be presented in the first trial
The proposed amendments significantly alter the case presented
result_of_case: Motion dismissed with leave to reapply
Specific conditions set for future amendments
procedure_followed: Motion hearing analyzed rules, procedural history, and impact of amendments on fairness and efficiency
